abstract: Oracle said Thursday it has received the Justice Department’s approval to move forward with its $7.4 billion acquisition of former dot-com-era star Sun Microsystems.
snippet: Oracle said Thursday it has received the Justice Department’s approval to move forward with its $7.4 billion acquisition of former dot-com-era star Sun Microsystems.
lead_paragraph: Oracle said Thursday it has received the Justice Department’s approval to move forward with its $7.4 billion acquisition of former dot-com-era star Sun Microsystems.

headline.main: Oracle Says Justice Approves $7.4 Billion Sun Deal
